title: Update Public Asset Inventory
description: A new public park has been completed. An operator must add the new assets (benches, playground equipment) to the city's asset management system.

tasks.description: Receive a list of new assets installed at the 'Willow Creek Park'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the list of new assets and their types.

tasks.description: For each new asset, create a new entry in the asset management database, including its location, type, and installation date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds all new assets to the database.

tasks.description: Schedule the first preventive maintenance inspection for the new assets according to their standard maintenance plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up the future maintenance schedule for the new park assets.
